title: AD Crit leblanc kills ppl faster than full AP burst leblanc

replies.body:
w8 is Crit LB actually becoming a thing?

because I just had one in my game today lol.
Assassins gotta burst somehow so even ap assassins are gonna start abusing crit builds

> [{quoted}](name=JamesTheMage15,realm=NA,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=bZP3FHGv,comment-id=00000000,timestamp=2017-09-20T23:57:46.893+0000)
>
> Assassins gotta burst somehow so even ap assassins are gonna start abusing crit builds

https://i.imgur.com/yNlQWRM.jpg?noredirect
Leblanc's 1.5 second delay on her passive allows her to get bursted before it proc's. AD burst items, aka crit and lethality cover this flaw
Exactly, by the time her passive proc is ready the adc has already auto attacked 3 times along with life stealing if they have any.
"if" {{item:1055}} they have it at level 1

(From my other comment)

>Lvl 18 Draven with {{item:3031}} {{item:3046}} {{item:3087}} {{item:3072}} {{item:3036}} {{item:3006}} .

>200 Ad from items+105 from levels = 305.
>Q damage: 50+(200 Bonus AD*105)= 260.
>Shiv proc: 160.

>Subtotal Physical damage: 305+260+160 = 565.
>Subtotal Magic damage (shiv): 160.
>Subtotal mixed damage: 565+160 = 725

>Total Physical damage with crit: 5652.50 = 1412
>Total Magic damage with crit: 1602.50 = 400.
>Total with crit: (565+160)*2.50 = 1812.

>(Let's assume he autos another Draven):

>Physical damage reduced by 82 armor: 1412100/(100+82) = 775.
>Magic damage reduced by 38 MR: 400100/(100+38) = 290.

>TL;DR: Final total amount: 1065 mixed damage.
>Draven base HP: 1952.

>So not one auto, two autos. From range, and point and click, at capped AS (so 5 attacks in 2 seconds), all the while healing 20% off >of it, all of this without taking into account runes and masteries. Seems balanced, amirite?
The Q damage doesn't crit lol. It just adds on to the normal auto crit.

Oh fuck. I'm retarded.


On the other hand it's still just 260 less damage.
Not really, you play it wrong than
Op is trying to use this as an excuse to bash ADCs, rather than the more obvious fact that’s LeBlanc just sucks right now.
Leblanc is one of the most powerful midlaners, a near perma ban in pro play.
emphasis on pro play there is a completely different meta from pros and average silver gold solo queue
dont say she "sucks" then, when she only sucks if played by lower elo people imo
yeah cuz if she sucks for 99.99999% of people she doesn't suck just cuz that 0.00001 pro players can use her better
I f only the boards would say the same for Lee Sin...
Im actually talking about both

Prove it..

Because i check it on practice tool full ap lb and full AD/CRIT lb

And the Full Ap LB did faster damage...

And the AD one even CRIT 4 of the 6 attacks.....

So you are full OF BS just to bash the AP items...
Sure ADCs are broken right now but what you say has no ground
I think he bashes LB's rework for the 1.5 seconds delay on her passive.

If this is true, it's absolutely hilarious.
So, is it because of her scaling not really working with ap builds or because of lackluster ap itemization?
Passive timer sucks balls later in the game
That's because in the same time it takes you to proc your passive, an ADC can right click you and instantly kill you with {{item:3087}} {{item:3031}}
I have never seen an ADC instantly kill someone via an auto with just IE and Shyv unless their stupidly fed and an ulting Vayne who Q>crits.
To be fair, I can kill a lot of people with IE and {{champion:102}} as an ADC...
With one auto?

Lvl 18 Draven with {{item:3031}} {{item:3046}}  {{item:3087}} {{item:3072}} {{item:3006}} {{item:3036}}. 

200 Ad from items+105 from levels = 305. 
Q damage: 50+(200 Bonus AD*105)= 260.
Shiv proc: 160.

Subtotal Physical damage: 305+260+160 = 565.
Subtotal Magic damage (shiv): 160.
Subtotal mixed damage: 565+160 = 725

Total Physical damage with crit: 565*2.50 = 1412
Total Magic damage with crit: 160*2.50 = 400.
Total with crit: (565+160)*2.50 = 1812.

(Let's assume he autos another Draven):

Physical damage reduced by 82 armor:  1412*100/(100+82) = 775.
Magic damage reduced by 38 MR: 400*100/(100+38) = 290.

**TL;DR**: Final total amount: 1065 mixed damage.
Draven base HP: 1952.

So not one auto, two autos. From range, and point and click, at capped AS (so 5 attacks in 2 seconds), all the while healing 20% off of it, all of this without taking into account runes and masteries. Seems balanced, amirite?

That's a full build burst ADC at max level with the stars aligning. 

The question was if someone could one shot with just Shyv and IE.

That build also won't reach 2.5 AS and if it could not every auto attack would use an axe. So that's wrong too.

> [{quoted}](name=WingedWinter,realm=EUW,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=bZP3FHGv,comment-id=0001000000000000000000000000,timestamp=2017-09-21T15:36:26.869+0000)
>
> Lvl 18 Draven with {{item:3031}} {{item:3046}}  {{item:3087}} {{item:3072}} {{item:3006}} {{item:3036}}.

> 200 Ad from items+105 from levels = 305. 
> Q damage: 50+(200 Bonus AD*105)= 260.
> Shiv proc: 160.
> 
> Subtotal Physical damage: 305+260+160 = 565.
> Subtotal Magic damage (shiv): 160.
> Subtotal mixed damage: 565+160 = 725
> 
> Total Physical damage with crit: 565*2.50 = 1412
> Total Magic damage with crit: 160*2.50 = 400.
> Total with crit: (565+160)*2.50 = 1812.
> 
> (Let's assume he autos another Draven):
> 
> Physical damage reduced by 82 armor:  1412*100/(100+82) = 775.
> Magic damage reduced by 38 MR: 400*100/(100+38) = 290.
> 
> **TL;DR**: Final total amount: 1065 mixed damage.
> Draven base HP: 1952.
> 
> So not one auto, two autos. From range, and point and click, at capped AS (so 5 attacks in 2 seconds), all the while healing 20% off of it, all of this without taking into account runes and masteries. Seems balanced, amirite?

Does this take into account his ratios from his abilities?
Does this take into account the second champion doing damage?
It's because Riot olafed her and made her trash.

> [{quoted}](name=FurorDivinus27,realm=EUW,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=bZP3FHGv,comment-id=00010001,timestamp=2017-09-21T00:45:16.631+0000)
>
> It's because Riot olafed her and made her trash.

They seriously need to revert her rework... They reverted Kogmaws and he wasn't even trashed after the rework.
That's because he was actual cancer and he didn't need a rework to begin with.

> [{quoted}](name=Niaphim,realm=EUW,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=bZP3FHGv,comment-id=0001,timestamp=2017-09-21T00:09:51.168+0000)
>
> If this is true, it's absolutely hilarious.
> So, is it because of her scaling not really working with ap builds or because of lackluster ap itemization?

All of her damage is jammed into her passive which takes like 2 seconds to actually go off.
I believe its 1.5.
LeBlanc is no no longer a burst mage assassin, she is a kite mage didn't ye know
just like {{champion:103}}
I don't particularly like LB's current state, but I highly doubt this is true. I'm going to need to see a replay OP.

I literally played every single champion full crit in Blood Moon, and they all worked exceptionally well

Ekko, Eve, Diana, Fizz, LeBlanc, Kennen, even Yasuo whooped some serious ass with full crit!
Yas is supposed to build crit...? Like, PD IE?
AD crit Leblanc is strictly worse than AP Leblanc until 3 items at the very least and if you haven't won the game by 3 items on Leblanc, you probably lost anyway.
Eh, I'd love it if you were right but you're wrong. Her ridiculous synergy with gunblade means she can almost 100-0 an ADC in 1.5, and AD Leblanc let's be honest, doesn't.

It's worth noting that what you call "ridiculous synergy with Gunblade" is actually ridiculous *dependency* on Gunblade. She absolutely needs that item to do anything, that's not synergy, it's a crutch.

Yes you're absolutely right. In a sense it acts as life support for her, and I'm pretty sure she will no longer be fun to play once the "synergy" is nerfed. She needs at least a lot of tweaking or another rework.

https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=wncf3JijauA

HE WAS RIGHT ALL ALONG

your point? you can kill anyone late game with multiplicative scaling items. nothing will scale harder than items that multiply their own damage off of each other. and crit chance, crit damage, attack speed, and attack damage all do this. 

try killing a leblanc 1 v 1 before 3/4 items. you aren't going to.
I say every burst champion build AD/crit. Maybe then riot will do something to fix it.
AD {{champion:136}} MID BOYZ 2K17 LET'S GO
{{champion:17}} : Let's abuse {{item:3147}} with my invis!
Build AS his animation looks so silly
